Author: sewnp
Text: I completely forgot about how important electrolytes are when you're abstaining from food oh geez. Thank you for reminding me! I'm wondering if something simple like those electrolyte drinks or those health juices in the medication aisle of the store could substitute? Rather than gathering them all separately. I've been told by a schoolmate that it's better to go the latter because of the unnecessary things they put into the drinks that could potentially mess with your insulin? Gonna do some more research on my own in the mean time, but thank you again for your concern!! I'm trying to be as healthy as possible with this illness <3

Author: 110_percent_bot
Text: Good luck, but also stay safe. mamma bear in me wants you to make sure you are getting electrolytes, they make everything after the 48 hour mark easier (and safer -- reduced likelihood of passing out). <3 <3 <3
